es.eucm.eadandroid.common.loader.parsers
Class AdaptationHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      es.eucm.eadandroid.common.loader.parsers.AdaptationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
public class AdaptationHandler
extends DefaultHandler

This handler reads the initial values for the adaptation engine. This class is only used for specific xml adaptation files, that is a past characteristic, to preserve past game version. In new versions, the adaptation info is in chapter.xml file.For this reason the parsing of assessment is now in chapter parsing (ChapterHandler)
